article_node.title: Inflation Risks; Trump Says India Offered to Cut its Tariffs to 'Nothing'
article_node.summary: U.S. equity futures and Treasury yields fell as markets reacted to a busy jobs‑data week and President Trump’s claim that India offered to eliminate its 50% tariffs on U.S. goods. The statement follows Trump’s imposition of tariffs in response to India’s Russian oil purchases. Market participants are weighing the potential impact on trade relations, U.S. economic resilience, and the Fed’s policy outlook.
